title: @KateyKhaos, Chroma Pack for Mecha Zero Sion
body:
I know he's not out yet, but there needs to be a chroma pack for him.

Maybe silver, blue/white, and red/gray/blue?

is sion viable? i feel like he's just that annoying tank that stands in your face but can't really kill you

I think he's solidly middle-of-the-pack. Titanic Hydra did a lot to help Sion actually deal damage, but his main goal in fights is disruption, never to get kills. 

But at any rate, this is the story and art board, not gameplay :P
